q1: Paris SG has a great line up this year. Who do you think will be the allstar?
q2: I am not sure, but it appears that Neymar and Rabiot are their best players.
a2: Neymar is a game changer for sure.
q3: Do you think Neymar will be playing for a long time for Paris?
a3: His contract with them ends in 2022, so time will tell.
q4: Where do you think he will transfer after his contract ends?
a4: Pariks SG won't let him go.
q5: What if they are offered a huge amount of money?
a5: He might change his mind if it is a huge amount of money
